news.title: Chennai Turbo Riders Announces Season 4 Lineup
news.excerpt: CTR reveals its powerful driver lineup for the upcoming Season 4 of the Indian Racing League.
news.author: CTR Team
news.content:
Chennai Turbo Riders is excited to announce our complete driver lineup for Season 4 of the Indian Racing League. Our team of talented drivers, including Jon Lancaster, Mohamed Ryan, Sandeep Kumar, and Emily Duggan, are ready to take on the challenges of the upcoming season.

With a mix of international experience and local talent, CTR aims to compete at the highest level and bring home victories for our fans. The season kicks off with the Chennai Street Circuit race, promising thrilling action on the streets of Chennai.

news.title: India's First Street Circuit Night Race Coming to Chennai
news.excerpt: Historic night race to be held on Chennai's streets with a 3.5 KM circuit.
news.author: Race Director
news.content:
For the first time in Indian motorsport history, Chennai will host a night race on its famous street circuit. The 3.5 KM track will be illuminated with state-of-the-art lighting, creating a spectacular atmosphere for both drivers and spectators.

The night race format will test the skills of our drivers in unique conditions, with cooler temperatures and different visibility challenges. Fans can expect an unforgettable experience as the cars thunder through the city streets under the night sky.

news.title: CTR Partners with Bharath College
news.excerpt: Chennai Turbo Riders welcomes Bharath College as title sponsor.
news.author: Partnership Manager
news.content:
Chennai Turbo Riders is proud to announce a new partnership with Bharath College as our title sponsor for Season 4. This collaboration represents our commitment to education and youth development in the motorsport community.

Bharath College's support will help us continue developing young talent and promoting motorsport education across India. Together, we aim to inspire the next generation of racing drivers and engineers.
